item.title: Why is show unread posts since last visit so broken
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

A post is unread when either, you have not viewed the topic, there have been new replies to the topic since you last visited it, or you have clicked the Mark unread link inside of a topic.

I face this problem (apparently, it’s a common issue: http://www.google.com/search?q=show+unread+posts+since+last+visit+smf+2+rc2) sometimes but I solve it in just a click. You might want to try clicking on the “Click here to try all unread topics” link and see if it works.
